# GitHub Actions workflow: Builds an Android APK using the Gradle wrapper
# Adjust Java, SDK, platform and build-tools versions below if your project requires different versions.
name: Build Android APK

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main ]
  pull_request:
  workflow_dispatch:

jobs:
  build:
    name: Build release APK
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    env:
      JAVA_VERSION: '11'                     # Change to 17 if your AGP/Gradle requires it
      ANDROID_SDK_ROOT: ${{ runner.temp }}/android-sdk

    steps:
    - name: Checkout
      uses: actions/checkout@v4

    - name: Set up JDK
      uses: actions/setup-java@v4
      with:
        distribution: temurin
        java-version: ${{ env.JAVA_VERSION }}

    - name: Cache Gradle
      uses: actions/cache@v4
      with:
        path: |
          ~/.gradle/caches
          ~/.gradle/wrapper
          ~/.gradle/native
        key: ${{ runner.os }}-gradle-${{ hashFiles('**/gradle-wrapper.properties') }}-${{ hashFiles('**/*.gradle*','**/build.gradle*') }}
        restore-keys: |
          ${{ runner.os }}-gradle-

    - name: Install Android SDK cmdline tools and packages
      run: |
        mkdir -p $ANDROID_SDK_ROOT
        cd $ANDROID_SDK_ROOT
        # Download latest (pin if you need deterministic behavior)
        curl -fsSL "https://dl.google.com/android/repository/commandlinetools-linux-9477386_latest.zip" -o cmdline.zip
        unzip -q cmdline.zip -d cmdline
        mkdir -p cmdline-tools/latest
        mv cmdline/cmdline-tools/* cmdline-tools/latest/ || true
        export PATH="$ANDROID_SDK_ROOT/cmdline-tools/latest/bin:$PATH"
        yes | sdkmanager --sdk_root=${ANDROID_SDK_ROOT} --licenses
        # Install required platform-tools, platform and build-tools (adjust versions as needed)
        sdkmanager --sdk_root=${ANDROID_SDK_ROOT} "platform-tools" "platforms;android-33" "build-tools;33.0.2"
      shell: bash

    - name: Show Java / Gradle info
      run: |
        java -version
        ./gradlew -v

    - name: Prepare Android keystore for signing (optional)
      if: ${{ secrets.ANDROID_KEYSTORE_BASE64 != '' }}
      env:
        ANDROID_KEYSTORE_BASE64: ${{ secrets.ANDROID_KEYSTORE_BASE64 }}
      run: |
        # Decode base64 keystore secret and create keystore file at repository root
        echo "$ANDROID_KEYSTORE_BASE64" | base64 --decode > android.keystore
        # Create keystore.properties so Gradle signingConfigs can pick it up.
        cat > keystore.properties <<EOF
        storeFile=android.keystore
        storePassword=${{ secrets.ANDROID_KEYSTORE_PASSWORD }}
        keyAlias=${{ secrets.ANDROID_KEY_ALIAS }}
        keyPassword=${{ secrets.ANDROID_KEY_PASSWORD }}
        EOF
        # Make sure gradle can read the file
        ls -la android.keystore keystore.properties || true

    - name: Ensure gradlew is executable
      run: chmod +x ./gradlew

    - name: Assemble release APK
      run: ./gradlew assembleRelease --no-daemon --stacktrace

    - name: Upload APK artifact
      uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
      with:
        name: app-release-apk
        path: app/build/outputs/**/*.apk
